English.value: We will totally defeat you, random Enemy!
And we'll do it in style!
You are nothing more than my daily conquest before naptime.
Mwa ha ha ha! You've fallen right into my trap. MiniBoss, go!
Ouch, this is tough... Time for reinforcements of our own!
Everyone, ignore MiniBoss! Go for EnemyCat and end this quickly!
Heh, turns out they weren't so tough after all!
